column5: To the OFC crew, Hope everybody had a great and safe 2009. I thought that I would share some of my more memorable moments of the softwater season. After I complete this post I will get all my rods out and clean them up and store them till next spring. Enjoy the pics.  WINTER AND SPRING I didnt get out very often for steelies this year but I had a pretty decent March hanging out in the bottom end of the creeks on the north shore of Lake Ontario. A little porn for the steelheaders.........      OPENER      SPRING PIKE I look forward to this time of year. Here are some of my favorite pics from this spring......       BASS Finally its here. I told myself that I would fish a few new lakes this year and managed to learn ( sort of ) five new bass waters. Caught some great fish this year but still didnt catch that "nickle" this season.          FALL PIKE Its funny how things go full circle. We are blessed in southern Ontario with all sorts of fishing to be had. I wish everybody a great 2010. See ya next spring.      P.S. Photo bucket sucks
Fantastic review! Thanks for taking the time to put it together. Jim
Nice fish Mike! Wheres the musky????  S.
awsome report man that last brown OMG MONSTER

Nice catches, I skimmed until I saw the bass section there...Great catches, a 5lb bass will come my friend it takes time. You had a incredible year, good luck...perhaps share with me some time how to catch those spring pike  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
looks like you had a great season!
Nice fish Mike!  That one steelie looks like an absolute rocket!  Good kill on the pike as well.
Nice fish, and beauty brown! Accidental catch while pike fishing Lake O? Its funny that you dont see more boats in the harbour.
Nice pile of different species of fish! They say 10% of fisherpersons catch 90% of the fish, my guess is you are probably in the 10%. Keep fishing bro'
Thanks for the pics msp Great year in review Leechman
